general: Today, the Moon is transiting in your sign, dear Aries, illuminating your aspirations and ambitions. You will feel fully invested, both mentally and physically and emotionally, in realizing your own path. Nothing and no one should divert you from your goals. However, be careful not to let your emotions take over. A challenging aspect between the Moon and Jupiter may push you to react excessively towards your loved ones who question your choices. Remember that feedback from your family and friends often comes from a good place, even if it may be difficult to hear. This evening, focus on your personal healing as Chiron activates.
love: Listen attentively to your partner's concerns; they can strengthen your relationship.
work: Keep an open mind to constructive criticism at work; it will help you move forward.
health: Take time to relax and reconnect with your emotions.
advice: Stay open to the advice of others.
teaser: Love and passion are on the agenda today!
